message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $950,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save a little more.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  What do you think?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $900,000. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
